3#include "../../../ast.hpp"
4#include "../native/nseq.hpp"

7namespace namu {
8
9 // another f**king annoying MSVC Hack:
10 // to avoid C2901 error, I need to declare sort of dllexport(import) things at here.
11 // spended plenty of hours again to find out the reason. thank you so much.
12 typedef class _nout tcppBridge<nseq> __seqSuperClass;
13
14 class _nout seq : public __seqSuperClass, public tucontainable<nint>, tarrayable<nint> {
15 NAMU(CLASS(seq, __seqSuperClass), VISIT())
16 typedef typename tucontainable<nint>::iter iter;
17 typedef typename tucontainable<nint>::iteration iteration;
18
19 public:
20 seq(nint start, nint end);
21 seq(nint start, nint end, nint step);
22
23 public:
24 using tarrayable<nint>::operator[];
25 nint& operator[](nidx n) override { return get()[n]; }
26
27 public:
28 const node& getElemType() const {
29 static nInt inner;
30 return inner;
31 }
32
33 using super::subs;
34 nbicontainer& subs() override;
35
36 ncnt len() const override { return get().len(); }
37
38 nbool has(nidx n) const override { return get().has(n); }
39
40 // get:
41 using tarrayable<nint>::get;
42 using super::get;
43 nint& get(nidx n) override { return get().get(n); }
44
45 // etc:
46 void rel() override { return get().rel(); }
47
48 protected:
49 iteration* _onMakeIteration(ncnt step) const override;
50
51 private:
52 // these method has been prohibited.
53 // set:
54 using tucontainable<nint>::set;
55 using tarrayable<nint>::set;
56 nbool set(const iter& at, const nint& new1) override { return false; }
57 nbool set(nidx n, const nint& new1) override { return false; }
58 // add:
59 using tucontainable<nint>::add;
60 using tarrayable<nint>::add;
61 nbool add(const iter& at, const nint& new1) override { return false; }
62 nbool add(nidx n, const nint& new1) override { return false; }
63 void add(const iter& here, const iter& from, const iter& to) override {}
64 // del:
65 using tucontainable<nint>::del;
66 nbool del(nidx n) override { return false; }
67 nbool del(const iter& it) override { return false; }
68 nbool del(const iter& from, const iter& to) override { return false; }
69 };
70}
